DOC.brief_summary: This study will implement and evaluate a community-based intervention to distribute and promote consumption of weekly iron-folic acid supplements and to provide nutrition education to reduce the prevalence of iron deficiency anemia among adolescent girls in West Bengal, India.
DOC.brief_title: Iron Supplementation Among Adolescent Girls in India
DOC.criteria: Girl 1219 years of age Resides in study area Does not reside in study area
